channel.title: Read This! Please
channel.description:
Hello , Im Using Rs2HD , Source And Im Editing Drops , By Tormented Demons , ID 8350 Heres , What It Looks Like.
8350=14484,100,100:100;1319,100,100:100;1201,100,100:100;1149,100,100:100;100,100,100:100;12883,100,100:100;1432,100,100:100;1185,100,100:100;
I need , it to drop 1 Set Of Dragon Claws , Dragon Platebody , Please Help? (Im Not Good @ Npc Drops) It Constantly , Keeps Dropping Bones
Thanks , For The Help
BigBean'

item.title: Read This! Please
item.dc:creator: @WaleedScape WaleedScape
item.description:
@WaleedScape wrote:

Do you know what the bone ID’s are?
if not, go to http://google.com and search itemdb.co.nr and search for the bone ID’s and replace them with dclaws

U dont need bones for every monster

Read full topic
